WorkItem.Description: Using online/offline Rawr version .12, Rawr fails import of addon version .10 (current version of addon on curse). Gives big bold red letters stating that version .10 of addon is out of date.
WorkItem.Summary: [LoadCharacter] AddOn Import says Out of Date

Comments.Message:
bah
In your imported text, go to the top and chant the 0.10 to 0.09 and it will import

Thanks Jothay worked like a charm. On another note, the main? purpose of the import would be to mark available items but I saw that this issue has been fixed and will be available next rawr release. Thanks again for the "trick."

Status is fixed, but it is not working for me.
Using the latest version available on curse (http://wow.curse.com/downloads/wow-addons/details/rawr-official.aspx) version 0.10 and http://elitistjerks.com/rawr.php.
It still say that I have an outdated addon. Changing the 0.10 to 0.09 removed the "outdated addon" message but I get loads of errors.

erduker; please note that this and many other issues are marked as Fixed or Closed within the past week but there has not been a new release since the date of the OP. Latest Rawr release is 4.0.12 which was released on 19DEC10, therefore this (and other recent fixes) will not be truly fixed till the next release (in a few days, hopefully). 
On another note, I recieved no errors after performing Jothay's modification. There may be other issues with the model you were using that you should search for and/or repost as necessary.
